member.name: T:Sideloader.AutoResolver.UniversalAutoResolver
member.summary: Automatically resolves ID conflicts by saving GUID to the card and changing item IDs at runtime

member.name: M:Sideloader.AutoResolver.UniversalAutoResolver.Hooks.OnValueChangedLutPrefix(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Translate the value (selected index) to the actual ID of the filter. This allows us to save the ID to the scene. Without this, the index is saved which will be different depending on installed mods and make it impossible to save and load correctly.

member.name: M:Sideloader.AutoResolver.UniversalAutoResolver.Hooks.ACEUpdateInfoPostfix(System.Object)

member.name: M:Sideloader.AutoResolver.UniversalAutoResolver.Hooks.ETCUpdateInfoPostfix(System.Object)
member.summary: Called after a scene load. Find the index of the currrent ramp ID and set the dropdown.

member.summary: ID of the item as defined in the mod's list files

member.name: P:Sideloader.AutoResolver.StudioResolveInfo.LocalSlot
member.summary: Resolved item ID. IDs greater than 100000000 are resolved IDs belonging to Sideloader. Use the resolved ID (local slot) to look up the original ID (slot)

member.summary: Dictionary key of the item, used on scene load

member.summary: Order of the item saved to the scene, used on scene import

member.summary: Used to determine if the item should be searched for ID lookups

member.summary: Version of the mod.

member.summary: Author of the mod. Not currently used for anything.

member.summary: Website of the mod. Not currently used for anything.

member.name: P:Sideloader.Manifest.Description
member.summary: Description of the mod. Not currently used for anything.

member.name: P:Sideloader.Manifest.Game
member.summary: Game the mod is made for. If specified, the mod will only load for that game. If not specified will load on any game.

member.name: M:Extensions.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Returns a new string in which all occurrences of a specified string in the current instance are replaced with another specified string according the type of search to use for the specified string.
member.param: The string performing the replace method.
The string replace all occurrences of . If value is equal to null, than all occurrences of will be removed from the .
One of the enumeration values that specifies the rules for the search.
member.returns: A string that is equivalent to the current string except that all instances of are replaced with . If is not found in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.
